title: Product Discovery Sprint
shortDescription: Run a focused discovery sprint to validate ideas and define product direction.
description: A structured approach to product discovery that helps you understand your market, users, and competitive landscape. Use this collection to run a focused discovery sprint before committing to building new features or products.

prompts.note: Understand the market opportunity and landscape
Define and understand your target users

prerequisites: A product area or opportunity to explore
Access to market data or research
